Last time we ran a 4GB KVM VPS deal exclusive at LET/LEB, we got quite a lot of new orders and happy customers, thank you all for the support!

Due to the high demands from the community, we have just added another batch of hardware nodes at multiple locations. The new locations we added are:

### Deal Details

* KVM Virtualization
* 4 vCPU
* 4096 RAM
* 60GB RAID10 Disk Space
* 2TB @ 1Gbit/s Uplink
* 1x IPv4 (Additional on request anytime!)
* Customized Control Panel
* $7/mo
* No Coupon Code Required

Order Now: https://portal.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=126

### New Control Panel

We just worked out a new control panel that has the following nice features:

* Power On/Power Off/Reboot VMs
* Real-time CPU/Disk/Network graphs
* HTML5 VNC Console
* Reset VM password within 1 click without reboot
* Reload OS from many templates
* Snapshots & Backups
* Firewall policies

### About Us

TheStack has been providing high-quality web hosting services since 2015. We've served thousands of happy customers throughout the world so far, and we are constantly improving our services to get close to our mission: being reliable but affordable.

We utilize Dual Intel E5 CPUs and RAID 10 arrays on all of our VPS nodes, and we never oversell, we provide a 99.9% uptime guarantee on all VPS plans. We've setup proactive monitoring for all of our nodes, should you have any server or network issues, you can reach out to our in-house support team anytime via helpdesk, email or live chat, you should always get a response within 20 minutes.

We've developed a new modern website in English and Simplified Chinese. We are interested in providing sponsorship to open-source projects and COVID-19 related projects, if you are looking for sponsorship, feel free to contact us.
